 18 /**
 19  * A calenader facet field. it uses solr's date facet capabilities, and displays 
 20  * the document count of one day using the DHTML calendar from www.dynarch.com/projects/calendar
 21  * 
 22  * @class CalendarWidget
 23  * @augments jQuery.solrjs.AbstractClientSideWidget
 24  */
 25 jQuery.solrjs.CalendarWidget = jQuery.solrjs.createClass ("AbstractClientSideWidget", { 
 26 
 27   /** 
 28    * Start date, used to restrict the calendar ui as well 
 29    * as the solr date facets.
 30    *
 31    * @field 
 32    * @public
 33    */
 34   startDate : null,
 35   
 36   /** 
 37    * Start date, used to restrict the calendar ui as well 
 38    * as the solr date facets.
 39    *
 40    * @field 
 41    * @public
 42    */
 43   endDate : null,  
 44   
 45   /** 
 46    * Current date facet array.
 47    *
 48    * @field 
 49    * @private
 50    */
 51   dates : null,  
 52   
 53   getSolrUrl : function(start) { 
 54     return "&facet=true&facet.mincount=1&facet.date=date&facet.date.start=1987-01-01T00:00:00.000Z/DAY&facet.date.end=1987-11-31T00:00:00.000Z/DAY%2B1DAY&facet.date.gap=%2B1DAY";
 55   },
 56 
 57   handleResult : function(data) { 
 58   
 59     var me = this;
 60     me.dates = [];
 61     jQuery.each(data.facet_counts.facet_dates.date, function(key, value) {
 62       var date = new Date(key.slice(0, 4), parseInt(key.slice(6, 8)) - 1, key.slice(8, 10));
 63       me.dates[date] = value;
 64     });
 65     
 66     jQuery(this.target).empty();
 67     
 68     var parent = document.getElementById("calendar");
 69 
 70     // construct a calendar giving only the "selected" handler.
 71     var cal = new Calendar(0, null, function (cal, date) {
 72       if (cal.dateClicked) {
 73         var dateString = "[" + date + "T00:00:00Z TO " + date + "T23:59:59Z]";
 74         var items =  [new jQuery.solrjs.QueryItem({field: me.fieldName , value:date, toSolrQuery: function() { return "date:" + dateString }})];
 75         solrjsManager.selectItems(me.id, items);
 76       }
 77     });
 78     cal.dateClicked = false;
 79     cal.weekNumbers = false;
 80     cal.setDateFormat("%Y-%m-%d");
 81     cal.setTtDateFormat("solrjs");
 82     
 83     cal.setDateStatusHandler(function(date) { 
 84         if (me.dates[date] != null && me.dates[date] > 0) {
 85           return "solrjs solrjs_value_" + me.dates[date];
 86         }
 87         return true;
 88       });
 89       
 90     cal.create(parent);
 91     cal.show();
 92     cal.setDate(new Date(1987, 2, 1));
 93     
 94     // override pribt method to display document count
 95     var oldPrint = Date.prototype.print;
 96     Date.prototype.print = function(string) {
 97       if (string.indexOf("solrjs") == -1) {
 98         return oldPrint.call(this, string);
 99       }
100       return me.dates[this] + " documents found!";
101     }
102   }
103 
104 });
105 
106
